thread.title: Ideal city stay!
thread.title_full: Ideal city stay! - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Isabella R
title: Ideal city stay!
text: Such a trendy hotel! The location is great which lets be honest if the most important thing in somewhere like New York. The staff were really friendly and helpful and the breakfast is amazing! I loved it here! Not to mention we got engaged on this trip so it's always going to be one to remember <3 I would highly recommend this hotel
